; Sun, 19 Nov 2023 18:25:05 +0800 一方提分手，另一方都应同意：或体面结束，或不受要挟http://www.infzm.com/contents/260903
;;2023-11-19 17:00:00;
;

;It is not uncommon for someone to break up when they are in a relationship. The question is, should I agree? My opinion is that when one party proposes a breakup, whether it is a real breakup or a breakup to coerce the other party into accepting their conditions, the other party should agree. 36Kr’s “2022 Chinese Couples Breakup Report” shows that more than 60% of girls break up first. We will use the woman to break up for analysis, but the opposite is true, and it also applies to the man to break up.

;

;Some young netizens discovered an interesting phenomenon around them: when girls propose breaking up, boys basically agree. TA further said that because some girls like to use breakup as a means, but boys generally use breakup as the result.

;

;We will discuss it on a case-by-case basis.

;

;In the first situation, a girl is serious about breaking up, but in the general perception of boys, breaking up is equivalent to announcing a breakup. You have informed me, so what if you don’t accept it?

;

;Besides, if you really want to break up, wouldn’t it be nice if the other party behaves decently and doesn’t keep pestering you? If one party wants to break up and the other party refuses to let go, it may lead to tragedy, which is what many people in love fear.

;

;I agree with the sentiment that "breakups are serious." Breaking up is equivalent to the death of love. A person who cherishes life should naturally cherish feelings. He should not talk about "breaking up" unless it is no longer possible and must be said. In other words, if you don't say "break up", don't leave any room for it - when you say "break up", it means "sealing the throat with a sword" to the old relationship.

;

;In the second situation, the girl’s proposal to break up is false and the purpose is to make her boyfriend submit. On Himalaya, some netizens complained: My girlfriend often threatens to break up with me in order to get me to give her gifts. What kind of mentality is this? A group of netizens commented: This kind of girlfriend just wants something from you. If you are not in too deep, it is better to leave decisively.

;

;In reality, it is often the case that girls who break up with them use the breakup as a game to force boys to compromise and satisfy their own needs. In this case, boys' indiscriminate pleading is "cooperating" with the game's tactics, and it is also a meaningless sacrifice of self-rights and due stance. This can lead to various passive situations. From the perspective of human nature, if a girl unreasonably breaks up with her, she will get very good results - for example, her boyfriend will obey her words and not dare to violate them at all. For example, her boyfriend will buy things to compensate her to make her happy. Then it will be difficult for this girl not to gain a sense of accomplishment and deliberately make it a kind of inertia, making the other person keep flapping according to the owner's wishes like a bird locked in a cage.

;

;As long as a person is not a masochist, it is unlikely that he can endure all kinds of teasing and belittling by the other party without breaking down. To fully accept unfair demands is to dig a hole for yourself. It’s so easy to give in and compromise when you’re in love. After getting married, if the other party files for divorce if they don’t get along, what should you do? Someone has said it well: "Breakups are mentioned frequently now, and divorce will definitely be mentioned frequently in the future." If this is the case, should we continue to compromise? If this is the case, how much happiness and trust can there be in a marriage? I'm afraid it has long been overdrawn by one party's willfulness, tyranny and one party's weakness.

;

;It can be seen that whether it is a true score or a false score, directly agreeing is the best choice. When a person is in front of someone who doesn't love him, or in front of someone who is always trying to "test" himself, there is no other way for him to do anything but be tough.

;

;Of course, people’s hearts are made of flesh, and after being together for a long time, it is indeed difficult to make a break. Human nature is always complicated. Being "kicked" by the other party when you still love the other party deeply is indeed shocking and painful. Therefore, some people who have been broken up with want to stay out of nostalgia for the past relationship. This is not It's strange, but facts show that long-term pain is worse than short-term pain. It is wise to leave the person who "mispaid" the relationship as soon as possible. No matter how difficult the decision is, no matter how painful the heart is, it is better than letting yourself fall into an emotional quagmire and be unable to get out.

;

;You must know that hesitating and insisting on breaking up will not only make you and the other party extremely tired, but you are also more likely to be laughed at and affect your work and life because you cry and feel depressed all day long. future. After all, stalking itself means losing self-esteem and "lowering to the dust". In addition, being indecisive and being weak can also bring about bad situations and even negative consequences. In life, some couples "will get together if they are separated for a long time, and they will break up if they are together for a long time." After wasting their great youth, they eventually ended up breaking up, which is equivalent to a wasted effort.

;

;In my hometown, some rural couples have been quarreling all their lives. Often one party wants to leave and the other refuses. As a result, the two people cannot reconcile until they grow old, which also affects the lives of their children. If they break up early, they can Is there such a thing?

;

;Comparing these results, resolutely agreeing to break up will not only save a lot of unnecessary troubles, but also "let go" both parties. Isn't this the best result?

;

;What's more, the firm consent of the person being broken up is also a lesson to the other party. A psychology expert told a story that one of her friends was broken up in love and was in a very low mood. He thought she had been dumped, but when he asked, he found out that she was the one who initiated the breakup. The point is, she didn't want to break up, she just threatened her boyfriend again, but this time her boyfriend didn't keep her.

;

;"Breaking up reveals one's character." As the saying goes, don’t do to others what you don’t want others to do to you. It’s not easy for two people who truly love each other to come together. They should manage their relationship well and jointly resist various risks encountered in the journey of life. How can you create risks and disturbances by yourself and let yourself fall into trouble? ?

;

;It is worth noting that some people like to talk about breaking up casually and use breakup to control others. This is not only disrespectful to the other party, but also completing a kind of discipline. Some people just enjoy the sense of accomplishment of "taming the other person under their feet and treating them like a dog."

;

;Since the discipline does not set a time limit, this situation should make people vigilant. Resisting discipline is the responsibility of every person in the "Emotional Castle". Getting together and staying together easily is the simplest and most practical love rule. Life is not long, and we can be prepared to spend this life with someone, or we can be prepared to let go when the opportunity arises. This is what we should do in order to avoid being troubled and constrained by a marriage that lacks quality.

;

;;•;;（ This article is only the author's personal opinion and does not represent the position of this newspaper);

; Sun, 19 Nov 2023 17:25:02 +0800 领航鲸“搬家”分几步？为啥要抹凡士林？http://www.infzm.com/contents/260907
;;2023-11-19 16:00:00;
;

;On November 17, two pilot whales more than 4 meters long and weighing about 800 kilograms arrived from Hangzhou Departing from a polar ocean park, "relocated" to an ocean park in Zhoushan more than 200 kilometers away, and moved into a more spacious "new home". With a head weighing 800 kilograms, it is quite a battle to "move" such a big man over a long distance. It not only requires cranes and large trucks, but also requires more than 20 adults to carry it. So the question is, how many steps does it take to "move" a pilot whale? What is the greatest difficulty? What preparations have the staff made to protect the pilot whales?

;

;What are the steps to “move” a pilot whale?

;

;It is not an easy task to "move" a pilot whale weighing about 800 kilograms, and to move both animals together. So, what are the steps to "move" a pilot whale?

;

;The staff said that there are five steps to "moving" the pilot whale this time. The first step: Capture and transportation, after capturing the pilot whale from the breeding tank, transport it to the box; The second step: Putting into the box and hoisting; The third step: Inspection before transportation, including the pilot whale’s breathing frequency, Check the mental state, etc.; Step 4: Monitoring during transportation, including monitoring of water temperature, air temperature, mental state, activity state, respiratory rate, etc. of animals during transportation; Step 5: After arriving at the destination, hoist into the water .

;

;What are the living habits of pilot whales? Why did it get its name?

;

;To successfully "move" a big guy like a pilot whale, you need to understand its physiological characteristics and living habits. Next, let’s get to know the large marine creature-pilot whale.

;

;Pilot whales are mammals in the family Cetacea, Delphinidae, and are also called "pilot whales" because of their huge size. Pilot whales are divided into two types: long-limbed pilot whales and short-limbed pilot whales. Long-limbed pilot whales are mainly distributed in high-latitude waters, while short-limbed pilot whales are distributed in tropical and temperate waters.

;

;;;

;;Sun Dong, associate researcher at the Second Institute of Oceanography of the Ministry of Natural Resources:;Pilot whales generally like to gather in large groups in the natural marine environment. The size of this group can usually reach 200 to 300. , this is a very large scale, which is rare among whales. Pilot whales are the liveliest among cetaceans. Pilot whales are often seen by sailors willing to accompany sailboats or ships when the ship is sailing on the sea. Their playful behavior.

;

;In recent years, due to the destruction of the marine environment, the number of pilot whales has been declining, and they have been included in the second level of my country's "List of National Key Protected Wild Animals".

;

;What are the difficulties for the "big" pilot whale to "move"?

;

;In addition to their large size and heavy weight, what are the difficulties in "moving" pilot whales? Come on and listen to the expert’s introduction.

;

;;Sun Dong, associate researcher at the Second Institute of Oceanography of the Ministry of Natural Resources:;From the most professional perspective, the most important thing about the "movement" of whales is that we call this whale Cetaceans need to use their lungs to breathe, so the vent on its back, or in layman's terms, its nostrils must be exposed above the water to prevent it from drowning. Cetaceans can drown. But the water cannot be put in very little. If it is put in very little, one will cause its skin to become dry and dehydrated. Dehydration is a very serious event for cetaceans. The second is the huge body of cetaceans. , it needs the buoyancy of water to support its weight. Another factor is temperature. For cetaceans, especially when the temperature rises, it will cause them to suffer from overheating shock. This should be strictly avoided.

;

;Why do pilot whales need to apply Vaseline when they “go out”?

;

;When it comes to "moving" a "big guy" like a pilot whale, every detail is important. There is such a detail in the transfer process that the reporter just photographed. After the pilot whale came out of the water, the staff smeared Vaseline on the pilot whale. Why did they do this?

;

;;Liu Quansheng, technical director of a polar marine park in Hangzhou:;The pilot whales apply Vaseline to prevent dehydration, because when the temperature is too high, cetaceans can easily dehydrate. After covering it with Vaseline, it will prevent moisture from dispersing. After applying Vaseline, we will cover it with a layer of wet towel. In this way, it has a water-retaining effect, that is, one is to prevent dehydration and the other is to moisturize.

;

;Experts told reporters that this time the two pilot whales "moved", they were smeared with medical Vaseline which had almost no harm to their skin. The main area of ​​application was the back skin exposed to the air, but Avoid air vents when applying. Two pilot whales arrived at their "new home" in Zhoushan. Before entering the water, the staff used a towel to wipe off the Vaseline on the pilot whales.

;

;How to reduce the stress response of pilot whales during transportation?

;

;From Hangzhou to Zhoushan, it spans more than 200 kilometers. To ensure the safety of the animals, the vehicle must maintain a stable speed of 90 kilometers per hour during transportation. This extended the original drive of more than 2 hours to 5 hours. How can pilot whales reduce their stress response during long-distance transfers and reach their "new home" safely?

;

;;Liu Quansheng, technical director of a polar marine park in Hangzhou:;We will stop eating 24 hours before transportation, and gradually reduce the amount of food in the first three days. This is the first ; Second, we will ensure appropriate water and air temperatures during transportation. This time we set the water temperature for the pilot whale at 23.5°C, which is a water temperature that is more suitable for raising it; third, we We need to ensure that the air in this transport vehicle circulates, that it cannot be too hot or too windy, and that it must be enclosed. Fourthly, we will have accompanying veterinarians and keepers who have raised it for a long time, who will caress and carry it out. An exchange.

;

;In order to allow the pilot whales to adapt to the new environment as quickly as possible, the room temperature, water temperature, lighting and other aspects of Zhoushan's "new home" are set according to the natural environment in which they live. However, in the first two days after arrival, the staff will feed a small amount of food, and then resume a normal diet after the pilot whales slowly adapt.

; Sun, 19 Nov 2023 16:25:03 +0800 商务部清理歧视外资措施，废除“特斯拉禁入”是个好的开始丨快评http://www.infzm.com/contents/260899
;;2023-11-19 15:00:00;
;

;A spokesman for the Ministry of Commerce recently stated at a regular press conference that the Ministry of Commerce has recently organized a special cleanup to further investigate Regulations and measures that may exist that discriminate against foreign-funded enterprises will create a fairer market competition environment for foreign-funded enterprises.

;

;According to the website of the Ministry of Commerce, the Department of Foreign Investment of the Ministry of Commerce issued a document on November 8, requiring a special cleanup of regulations and measures containing unreasonable differential treatment of domestic and foreign capital. The scope of the cleanup includes laws, regulations, normative documents, and other policy measures issued by local governments and departments, as well as various measures related to business entities formulated by relevant departments. The document also lists a number of specific cleanup matters, including restrictions on foreign investment in access areas, discriminating or excluding foreign-invested enterprises and their products and services on the grounds of foreign brands, excluding or restricting foreign-invested enterprises from participating in government procurement, etc.

;

;The Ministry of Commerce’s special clean-up operation is targeted. In recent years, with the improvement of China's economic strength and external trade frictions such as "decoupling and breaking links", there has been a domestic argument that "it is strong enough and no longer needs foreign investment." There are also more and more comments on social media that are hostile to foreign brand products, and there are even restrictions on foreign brand products in some places. Some time ago, Hunan Yueyang Sanhe Airport banned Tesla electric vehicles from entering the airport on the grounds of "confidential control." After attracting great attention, Yueyang Airport lifted this restriction, but similar phenomena still exist in many local departments. In addition to Tesla, Apple's mobile phones and other electronic products also receive special "care".

;

;This kind of restriction on foreign brands has no legal basis. In September 2023, Foreign Ministry spokesperson Mao Ning stated at a press conference that China has not issued laws, regulations or policy documents prohibiting the purchase and use of foreign brand mobile phones such as Apple. The reason why some departments and companies ban Tesla cars, Apple mobile phones, etc. is that their cameras, microphones and other sensors may obtain surrounding environment information and upload it abroad, which involves "state secrets" and "personal information security". However, according to Tesla's statement, the video captured by its car's "Sentinel Mode" is only stored in the vehicle's local storage device and will not be uploaded to the Internet. Other vehicle data will only be uploaded to the company's data center in China. The iCloud service used by Apple's domestic users is also operated by the domestic big data company "Cloud Guizhou".

;

;Although Tesla and Apple are foreign brands, their products sold domestically are basically produced in factories in China. Their super factory in Shanghai has more than 10,000 employees. In addition, the localization rate of Tesla's auto parts has exceeded 95%, which has stimulated the development of many domestic companies in the upstream industrial chain, not only bringing income to the employees of these companies, but also improving the production level of the companies. The improvement of the production capacity of these enterprises has also provided energy for the development of other domestic automobile manufacturers. The same is true for Apple. Not only does its domestic foundries directly provide jobs for hundreds of thousands of people, but it also greatly improves the capabilities of the domestic industrial chain through strict management of domestic suppliers.

;

;Introducing foreign capital is not just about hundreds of millions or even billions of money, but more importantly, entrepreneurial spirit and talent, which is to discover or even "create" market opportunities and seize them. , the ability to create social wealth. During the process of reform and opening up, the introduction of foreign investment has played a huge role in promoting China's economic development. This impetus does not only come from money itself. China's goal of introducing foreign investment is not only to solve the problem of insufficient domestic development funds, but more importantly, to "learn advanced Western technology and management experience."

;

;In fact, it may be the competition, management and other concepts that come with foreign investment that play a greater role in promoting China's development. It is precisely because of the pressure of foreign capital that China's market-oriented reform has been accelerated, and domestic enterprises have also strengthened their bodies and developed in the competition with foreign capital. Even though China has now become the world's second largest economy, it still needs to introduce foreign investment. Because in many areas, China still needs foreign technology and entrepreneurial talents.

;

;In August 2023, the State Council issued the "24 Policies and Measures for Attracting Foreign Investment," emphasizing the need to create a "market-oriented, legal, and international first-class business environment." A market-oriented and legalized business environment requires that foreign-invested enterprises be treated equally and receive national treatment. As long as they are not within the scope of the negative list stipulated by the state, there cannot be any discrimination or restrictions on foreign investment. The products and services provided by domestic foreign-funded enterprises should also be treated equally with those of other domestic enterprises. Just like although the "Government Procurement Law" stipulates that under normal circumstances government procurement "should purchase domestic goods, projects and services," the Ministry of Finance issued a special document in 2021 requiring that except for procurement projects involving national security and state secrets, government procurement must not distinguish Treat products produced in China by domestic and foreign-funded enterprises. As long as it is produced within China, regardless of whether its suppliers are domestic or foreign, their equal participation in government procurement should be guaranteed. This special clean-up operation by the Ministry of Commerce also includes the issue of restricting foreign-invested enterprises from participating in local bidding and government procurement as a clean-up matter.

;

;After the Ministry of Commerce’s cleanup operation began, social media information showed that some local agencies’ “No Tesla Entry” signs had been removed. Prohibiting discrimination against foreign-owned enterprises is a good start.

;The global obesity and overweight problems have become increasingly apparent in recent decades. According to data from the World Health Organization, in 2016 Nearly 40% of adults worldwide are overweight, of which 13% are obese. There are approximately 2 billion overweight people. This increase continues despite public health measures to prevent and slow obesity in many countries. Along with the obesity epidemic comes a large disease burden. How to better manage weight has become an urgent problem in the field of health sciences.

;

;;Balancing the quality and quantity of carbohydrates;

;

;Carbohydrates, as a major source of dietary energy for people, have long been the focus of weight loss. Coping strategies such as the "ketogenic diet" of eating less or no staple food, or even strictly limiting carbohydrate intake have been derived. The "ketogenic diet" cuts off carbohydrates as an energy source and attempts to promote weight loss by burning fat to provide energy. Although this method has some short-term experimental support, what will happen if it is persisted in the long term is still a mystery.

;

;Moreover, the "ketogenic diet" requires maintaining a high level of fat intake while maximizing carbohydrate intake, which may increase the risk related to cardiovascular disease. In addition, it will also put pressure on the liver, kidneys and maintenance of nutritional balance, and there is a risk of a series of adverse reactions such as cognitive decline, constipation, fatigue, and nausea. Therefore, long-term adherence to such a diet for weight loss remains controversial.

;

;However, compared with the controversial "ketogenic diet" that strictly limits carbohydrate intake, a diet that reasonably controls carbohydrates has actually been widely recognized, including paying more attention to nutritional balance and simplicity. Processed “Mediterranean Diet” etc. Recently, scientists from Harvard School of Public Health and other institutions also found through long-term observational studies that instead of focusing generally on the total amount of carbohydrate intake, it is better to pay more attention to the quality and source of carbohydrates, so as to achieve better long-term weight management.

;

;Because their research data shows that some carbohydrate-containing foods do make you fatter as you eat them, but there are also some carbohydrate-rich foods that may actually have a weight loss effect if you eat too much of them. Overall, higher glycemic index and glycemic load will lead to weight gain. Adding 100 grams of starch or added sugar per day increased weight gain by 1.5 kilograms and 0.9 kilograms respectively over four years. Relevant research was published in the British Medical Journal (BMJ) in September 2023. The main sources of daily starch are seeds and tubers such as wheat and rice, which are various staple foods.

;
